analyzed: ekam eva advitīyam tat brahma iti upaniṣad vacaḥ

original: brahmaṇo 'nyasya sadbhāvaṃ nanu tat pratiṣedhati // YSsi_1 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ nyasya sadbhāvam nanu tat pratiṣedhati
atra brūmaḥ dvitīya uktau samāsaḥ kaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: kiṃsvit tatpuruṣaḥ kiṃ vā bahuvrīhir athocyatām // YSsi_2 //
analyzed: kim svid tatpuruṣaḥ kim vā bahuvrīhiḥ atha ucyatām
pūrvasmin uttaraḥ tāvat pradhānyena vivakṣyate

original: padārthas tatra tad brahma tato'nyat sadṛśaṃ tu vā // YSsi_3 //
analyzed: padārthaḥ tatra tat brahma tatonyat sadṛśam tu vā

original: tadviruddham atho vā syāt triṣv apy anyan na bādhate /
analyzed: tad viruddham atha u vā syāt triṣu api anyat na bādhate

original: anyatve sadṛśatve vā dvitīyaṃ sidhyati dhruvam // YSsi_4 //
analyzed: anya tve sadṛśa tve vā dvitīyam sidhyati dhruvam

original: viruddhatve dvitīyena tṛtīyaṃ prathamaṃ tu vā /
analyzed: viruddha tve dvitīyena tṛtīyam prathamam tu vā

original: brahma prāpnoti yasmāt tad dvitīyena virudhyate // YSsi_5 //
analyzed: brahma prāpnoti yasmāt tat dvitīyena virudhyate
atas sa prathamāḥ sarve tṛtīya ādi artha rāśayaḥ

original: dvitīyena tathā spṛṣṭvā svārthās tiṣṭhanty abādhitāḥ // YSsi_6 //
analyzed: dvitīyena tathā spṛṣṭvā sva arthāḥ tiṣṭhanti abādhitāḥ
nanu nam brahmaṇaḥ nyasya sarvasya eva niṣedhakam
dvitīya grahaṇam yasmāt sarvasya eva upalakṣaṇam

original: naivaṃ niṣedho na hy asmād dvitīyasyāvagamyate /
analyzed: na evam niṣedhaḥ na hi asmāt dvitīyasya avagamyate

original: tato 'nyat tadviruddhaṃ vā sadṛśaṃ vātra vakti saḥ // YSsi_8 //
analyzed: tatas tad viruddham vā sadṛśam vā atra vakti saḥ

original: dvitīyaṃ yasya naivāsti tad brahmeti vivakṣite /
analyzed: dvitīyam yasya na evā asti tat brahma iti vivakṣite
satya ādi lakṣaṇa uktīnām apalakṣaṇa tā bhavet
advitīye dvitīya artha na astitā mātra gocare

original: svaniṣṭhatvān nañarthasya na syād brahmapadānvayaḥ // YSsi_10 //
analyzed: sva niṣṭha tvāt nañ arthasya na syāt brahma pada anvayaḥ
dvitīya śūnyatā tatra brahmaṇaḥ na viśeṣaṇam

original: viśeṣaṇe vā tad brahama tṛtīyaṃ prathamaṃ tu vā // YSsi_11 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇe vā tat tṛtīyam prathamam tu vā
prasaktam pūrvavat sarvam bahuvrīhau samasyati

original: brahmaṇaḥ prathamā ye ca tṛtīyādyā jagattraye // YSsi_12 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ prathamāḥ ye ca tṛtīya ādyāḥ jagattraye

original: brahma praty advitīyatvāt svasthās tiṣṭhanty abādhitāḥ /
analyzed: brahma prati advitīya tvāt svasthāḥ tiṣṭhanti a bādhitāḥ

original: kiñ ca tatra bahuvrīhau samāse saṃśrite sati // YSsi_13 //
analyzed: kim ca tatra bahuvrīhau samāse saṃśrite sati
vṛtti arthasya nañ arthasya na padārtha antara anvayaḥ

original: saty arthāntarasambandhe ṣaṣṭhī yasyeti yujyate // YSsi_14 //
analyzed: sati artha antara sambandhe ṣaṣṭhī yasya iti yujyate

original: asattvān na hy asad brahma bhaven nāpi viśeṣaṇam // YSsi_15 //
analyzed: asattvāt na hi asat brahma bhavet na api viśeṣaṇam
tasmāt prapañca sadbhāvaḥ na advaita śruti bādhitaḥ

original: svapramāṇabalāt siddhaḥ śrutyā cāpy anumoditaḥ // YSsi_16 //
analyzed: sva pramāṇa balāt siddhaḥ śrutyā ca api anumoditaḥ
tena advitīyam brahma iti śruteḥ arthaḥ yam ucyate
dvitīya gaṇanā yogyaḥ na āsīt asti bhaviṣyati

original: samo vābhyadhiko vāsya yo dvitīyas tu guṇyate /
analyzed: samaḥ vā abhyadhikaḥ vā asya yaḥ dvitīyaḥ tu guṇyate

original: yato 'sya vibhavavyūha- kalāmātram idaṃ jagat // YSsi_18 //
analyzed: yatas sya vibhava vyūha kalā mātram idam jagat
dvitīya vāc āspada tām pratipadyeta tat katham

original: yathā colanṛpaḥ samrāḍ- advitīyo 'dya bhūtale // YSsi_19 //
analyzed: yathā cola nṛpaḥ samrāj advitīyaḥ bhū tale
iti tad tulya nṛpati nivāraṇa param vacaḥ
na tu tad bhṛtya tad putra kalatra ādi niṣedhakam
tathā sura asura nara brahma brahmāṇḍa koṭayaḥ
kleśa karma vipāka ādyaiḥ a spṛṣṭasya akhila īśituḥ
jñāna ādi ṣāṇguṇya nidheḥ acintya vibhavasya tāḥ
viṣṇoḥ vibhūti mahima samudra drapsa vipra ṣaḥ
kaḥ khalu aṅguli bhaṅgena samudrān sapta saṅkhyayā
gaṇayan gaṇayet ūrmi phena budbuda vipruṣaḥ

original: yathaika eva savitā na dvitīyo nabhaḥsthale /
analyzed: yathā ekaḥ eva savitā na dvitīyaḥ nabhaḥ sthale

original: ityuktyā na hi sāvitrā niṣidhyante 'tra raśmayaḥ // YSsi_24 //
analyzed: iti uktyā na hi sāvitrāḥ niṣidhyante raśmayaḥ
yathā saṅkhyāyām na eva gaṇyate
saṅkhyā pṛthak satī tatra saṅkhyeyā anya padārtha vat
tathā
pādaḥ u sya viśvā bhūtāni tri pādasya amṛtam divi

original: iti bruvan jagat sarvam itthambhāve nyaveśayat // YSsi_26 //
analyzed: iti bruvan jagat sarvam itthambhāve nyaveśayat
tathā

original: etāvān asya mahimā tato jyāyastaro hi saḥ /
analyzed: etāvān asya mahimā tatas jyāyastaraḥ hi saḥ

original: yatrānyan na vijānāti sa bhūmod aram antaram /
analyzed: yatra anyat na vijānāti sa bhūmā ud aram antaram

original: kurute 'sya bhayaṃ vyaktam ityādiśrutayaḥ parāḥ // YSsi_27 //
analyzed: kurute sya bhayam vyaktam ityādi śrutayaḥ parāḥ

original: meror ivāṇur yasyedaṃ brahmāṇḍam akhilaṃ jagat /
analyzed: meroḥ iva aṇuḥ yasya idam brahmāṇḍam akhilam jagat
ityādikāḥ samastasya tad itthambhāva tā aparāḥ
vācā ārambhaṇa mātram tu jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam
vikāra jātam
kūṭastham mūla kāraṇam eva sat
ananyat kāraṇāt kāryam pāvakāt visphuliṅga vat
mṛttikā loha bīja ādi nānā dṛṣṭānta vistaraiḥ

original: nāśakad dagdham analas tṛṇaṃ majjayituṃ jalam /
analyzed: na aśakat dagdham analaḥ tṛṇam majjayitum jalam

original: na vāyuś calituṃ śaktaḥ tacchaktyāpy āyanād ṛte // YSsi_31 //
analyzed: na vāyuḥ calitum śaktaḥ tad śaktyā api āyanāt ṛte
eka pradhāna vijñānāt vijñātam akhilam bhavet
ityādi veda vacana tad mūla āpta āgamaiḥ api
brahma ātmanā ātmalābhaḥ yam prapañcaḥ cit acit mayaḥ

original: iti pramīyate brāmhī vibhūtir na niṣidhyate // YSsi_33 //
analyzed: iti pramīyate brāmhī vibhūtiḥ na niṣidhyate
tad niṣedhe tasya mithyātvāt loka vedayoḥ

original: vyavahārās tu lupyeran tathā syād brahmadhīr api // YSsi_34 //
analyzed: vyavahārāḥ tu lupyeran tathā syāt brahma dhīḥ api
vyāvahārika satya tvāt mṛṣātve pi aviruddha tā

original: pratyakṣāder iti mataṃ prāg eva samadūduṣam // YSsi_35 //
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādeḥ iti matam prāk eva samadūduṣam
atas brahma advaita dhiyā jagat

original: na bādhyate vibhūtitvād brahmaṇaś cetyavasthitam // YSsi_36 //
analyzed: na bādhyate vibhūti tvāt brahmaṇaḥ ca iti avasthitam

original: nanu sattve prapañcasya nāstīti pratyayaḥ katham /
analyzed: nanu sattve prapañcasya na asti iti pratyayaḥ katham

original: asattve vā kathaṃ tasminn astīti pratyayo bhavet // YSsi_37 //
analyzed: asattve vā katham tasmin asti iti pratyayaḥ bhavet
sat asat tvam tathā ekasya viruddha tvāt asambhavi
sat asat pratyaya prāpta viruddha dvandva saṅgame
tayoḥ anyatara arthasya niścaya abhāva hetutaḥ

original: sadasattvaṃ prapañcasya jainās tu pratipedire // YSsi_39 //
analyzed: sat asat tvam prapañcasya jaināḥ tu pratipedire
sattva prāptim puraskṛtya na asti iti pratyaya udayāt

original: sadā sattvaṃ prapañcasya sāṅkhyās tu pratipādire // YSsi_40 //
analyzed: sadā sattvam prapañcasya sāṅkhyāḥ tu pratipādire
sat asat pratyaya prāpta viruddha dvandva saṅkaṭe
virodha parihāra artham sattva asattva aṃśa bhaṅgataḥ

original: sadasadbhyām anirvācyaṃ prapañcaṃ kecid ūcire // YSsi_41 //
analyzed: sat asadbhyām anirvācyam prapañcam kecid ūcire
sattva asattve vibhāgena

original: ghaṭāder iti manvānā vyavasthām apare jaguḥ // YSsi_42 //
analyzed: ghaṭa ādeḥ iti manvānāḥ vyavasthām apare jaguḥ
tat evam vādi sammardāt saṃśaye samupasthite

original: nirṇayaḥ kriyate tatra mīmaṃsakamatena tu // YSsi_43 //
analyzed: nirṇayaḥ kriyate tatra mīmaṃsaka matena tu
ghaṭa svarūpe nāstitvam astitvam yadi abūbudhat

original: syād eva yugapatsattvam asattvaṃ ca ghatādiṣu // YSsi_44 //
analyzed: syāt eva yugapad sattvam asattvam ca ghata ādiṣu
idānīm idam atra asti na asti iti evaṃvidhā yatas

original: deśakāladaśābhedād asti nāstīti no dhiyaḥ // YSsi_45 //
analyzed: deśa kāla daśā bhedāt asti na asti iti naḥ dhiyaḥ
atas deśa ādi bhedena sat asat tvam ghaṭa ādiṣu

original: vyavasthitaṃ nirastatvād vādasyeha na sambhavaḥ // YSsi_46 //
analyzed: vyavasthitam nirasta tvāt vādasya iha na sambhavaḥ
nanu deśa ādi sambandhaḥ sataḥ eva upapadyate

original: na deśakālasambandhād asataḥ sattvam iṣyate // YSsi_47 //
analyzed: na deśa kāla sambandhāt asataḥ sattvam iṣyate

original: sambandho dvyāśrayas tasmāt sataḥ sattvaṃ sadā bhavet /
analyzed: sambandhaḥ dvi āśrayaḥ tasmāt sataḥ sattvam sadā bhavet
asataḥ kārakaiḥ sattvam janmanā iti ati durghaṭam
ādi antavān sat kakṣā antar niveśyate
uktam ca

original: “ādāv ante ca yan nāsti nāsti madhye 'pi tat tathā” /
analyzed: ādau ante ca yat na asti na asti madhye tat tathā

original: ato niścitasadbhāvaḥ sadā sann abhyupeyatām // YSsi_49 // iti
analyzed: atas niścita sadbhāvaḥ sadā san abhyupeyatām iti
asataḥ sarvadā asattvam janya yogāt khapuṣpa vat

original: asattve na viśeṣo 'sti prāgatyantāsator iha // YSsi_50 //
analyzed: asattve na viśeṣaḥ sti prāk atyanta asatoḥ iha

original: śvetaketum upādāya tat tvam ity api yac chrutam /
analyzed: śvetaketum upādāya tat tvam iti api yat śrutam
ṣaṣṭha prapāṭake tasya kutas mukhya artha sambhavaḥ
kārpaṇya śoka duḥkha ārtaḥ cetanaḥ tvaṃpadā uditaḥ

original: tatpadārthas tayor aikyaṃ tejas timiravat katham // YSsi_52 //

analyzed: tvam artha sthe taṭa sthe vā tad artha sthe vibhedake
guṇe tattvam pada śrutyoḥ aikārthyam dūra vāritam
ajña tva sarva vedi tva duḥkhi tva sukhi tā ādike

original: viśeṣaṇe vā ciddhātor atha vāpy upalakṣaṇe /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇe vā cit dhātoḥ atha vā api upalakṣaṇe
viruddha guṇa saṅkrānteḥ bhedaḥ syāt tvam tad arthayoḥ

original: so 'yaṃ gaur itivat tattvaṃ padayor ity apeśalam // YSsi_55 //
analyzed: saḥ yam gauḥ iti vat tattvam padayoḥ iti apeśalam
deśa kāla daśā bhedāt ekasmin api dharmiṇi

original: viruddhadvandvasaṅkrānteḥ so 'yaṃ gaur iti yujyate // YSsi_56 //
analyzed: viruddha dvandva saṅkrānteḥ saḥ yam gauḥ iti yujyate
na vyavasthāpakam kiñcid deśa kāla daśā ādike
nirdhūta nikhila dvandva sva prakāśe cit ātmani
dvaita anartha bhrama abhāvāt śāstram nirviṣayam bhavet
etena satya kāma tva jagat kāraṇatā ādayaḥ
māyā upādhau pare
dhyastāḥ śoka moha ādayaḥ punar

original: avidyopādhike jīve vināśe neti yan matam /
analyzed: avidyā upādhike jīve vināśe nā iti yat matam

original: kṣudrabrahmavidām etan mataṃ prāg eva dūṣitam // YSsi_60 //
analyzed: kṣudra brahma vidām etat matam prāk eva dūṣitam
cit svarūpe viśiṣṭe vā māyā avidyā ādi upādhayaḥ
pūrvasmin sarva sāaṅkaryam para jīva avibhāgataḥ

original: uttarasminn api tathā viśiṣṭam api cid yadi /
analyzed: uttarasmin api tathā viśiṣṭam api cit yadi
cit svarūpam hi nirbhedam māyā avidyā ādi upādhibhiḥ

original: vibhinnam iva vibhrāntaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ ca ... (mataṃ tava) // YSsi_62 //
analyzed: vibhinnam iva vibhrāntam viśiṣṭam ca matam tava

original: taṭasthāvasthitā dharmāḥ svarūpaṃ na spṛśanti kim /
analyzed: taṭa stha avasthitāḥ dharmāḥ sva rūpam na spṛśanti kim

original: na hi daṇḍiśiraśchedād devadatto na hiṃsitaḥ // YSsi_63 //
analyzed: na hi daṇḍi śiraḥ chedāt devadattaḥ na hiṃsitaḥ

original: atas tat tvam asīty āder arthe ity apy asundaram // YSsi_64 //
analyzed: atas tat tvam asi iti ādeḥ arthe iti api asundaram
a brahma anātma tā bhāve pratyak cit pariśiṣyate
tattvam pada dvayam jīva para tādātmya gocaram
tad mukhya vṛtti tādātmyam api vastu dvaya āśrayam
bheda abheda vikalpaḥ tu yat tvayā paricoditaḥ
satye bandhe sati nirarthakaḥ
abhedaḥ bheda mardī tu sva āśrayībhūta vastunoḥ

original: bhedaḥ parasparānātmyaṃ bhāvānām evam etayoḥ // YSsi_67 //
analyzed: bhedaḥ paraspara anātmyam bhāvānām evam etayoḥ
svarūpam abhyupetya eva bheda abheda vikalpayoḥ
bādhanam tena vāc abādhā virodhena nigṛhyase

original: nīle nīlamatir yādṛg- utpale nīladhīr hi sā /
analyzed: nīle nīla matiḥ yādṛś utpale nīla dhīḥ hi sā

original: nīlam utpalam evedam iti sākṣāccakāsti naḥ // YSsi_70 //
analyzed: nīlam utpalam evā idam iti sākṣāt cakāsti naḥ
yathā vidita saṃyoga sambandhe pi akṣa gocare
bheda abheda ādi dustarka vikalpa ādhāna vibhramaḥ
tadvat tādātmya sambandhe śruti pratyakṣa mūlake
śruti daṇḍena dustarka vikalpa bhrama vāraṇam
nirdoṣā apauruṣeyī ca śrutiḥ atyartham ādarāt

original: asakṛttattvam ity āha tādātmyaṃ brahmajīvayoḥ // YSsi_73 //
analyzed: asakṛt tattvam iti āha tādātmyam brahma jīvayoḥ
phale ca phalinaḥ bhāvāt mokṣasya a puruṣa artha tā

original: ekaśeṣe hi ciddhātoḥ kasya mokṣaḥ phalaṃ bhavet // YSsi_74 //
analyzed: eka śeṣe hi cit dhātoḥ kasya mokṣaḥ phalam bhavet

original: kiñ ca prapañcarūpeṇa kā nu saṃvid vivartate /
analyzed: kim ca prapañca rūpeṇa kā nu saṃvid vivartate

original: na tāvad ghaṭadhīs tasyām asatyām api darśanāt // YSsi_75 //
analyzed: na tāvat ghaṭa dhīḥ tasyām asatyām api darśanāt

original: na hi tasyām ajātāyāṃ naṣṭāyāṃ vākhilaṃ jagat /
analyzed: na hi tasyām a jātāyām naṣṭāyām vā akhilam jagat
na asti iti śakyate vaktum uktau pratyakṣa badhanāt

original: nāpy anyasaṃvit tannāśe 'py anyeṣām upalambhanāt // YSsi_76 //
analyzed: nā api anya saṃvid tad nāśe anyeṣām upalambhanāt

original: nanu saṃvidabhinnaikā na tasyām asti bhedadhīḥ /
analyzed: nanu saṃvid abhinnā ekā na tasyām asti bheda dhīḥ

original: ghaṭādayo hi bhidyante na tu sā cit prakāśanāt // YSsi_77 //
analyzed: ghaṭa ādayaḥ hi bhidyante na tu sā cit prakāśanāt
ghaṭa dhīḥ paṭa saṃvitti samaye na avabhāti ced

original: naivaṃ, ghaṭo hi nābhāti sā sphuraty eva tu sphuṭam // YSsi_78 //
analyzed: nā evam ghaṭaḥ hi nā ābhāti sā sphurati eva tu sphuṭam
ghaṭa vyāvṛtta saṃvittiḥ atha na sphurati iti ced
tad vyāvṛtti padena api kim sā evā uktā atha vā itarat

original: saiva ced bhāsate 'nyac cen na brūhas tasya bhāsanam // YSsi_79 //
analyzed: sā eva ced bhāsate nyat ced na brūhaḥ tasya bhāsanam

original: kiñ cāsyāḥ svaprakāśāyā nīrūpāyā na hi svataḥ /
analyzed: kim ca asyāḥ sva prakāśāyāḥ nīrūpāyāḥ na hi svatas
ṛte viṣaya nānātvāt nānātva avagraha bhramaḥ

original: na vastu vastudharmo vā na pratyakṣo na laukikaḥ /
analyzed: na vastu vastu dharmaḥ vā na pratyakṣaḥ na laukikaḥ
ghaṭa ādi vedya bhedaḥ pi kevalam bhrama lakṣaṇaḥ
yadā tadā tadā āyataḥ dhī bheda avagraha udayaḥ
kutas kutastarām tasya parama artha tva sambandhaḥ

original: kiñ ca svayaṃprakāśasya svato vā parato 'pi vā /
analyzed: kim ca svayaṃprakāśasya svatas vā paratas vā
svatas tāvat na yujyate
svasmin sati viruddha tvāt abhāvasya anavasthiteḥ
sva nimitta prakāśasya svasya abhāve pi asambhavāt

original: ananyagocaratvena cito na parato 'pi ca // YSsi_84 //
analyzed: an anya gocara tvena citaḥ na paratas ca

original: kiñ ca vedyasya bhedāder na ciddharmatvasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: kim ca vedyasya bheda ādeḥ na cit dharma tva sambhavaḥ

original: rūpādivat, ataḥ saṃvid- advitīyā svayaṃprabhā // YSsi_85 //
analyzed: rūpa ādi vat atas saṃvid advitīyā svayaṃprabhā
atas tad bhedam āśritya yat vilakṣaṇa ādi jalpitam
tad avidyā vilāsaḥ yam iti brahma vidaḥ viduḥ
hanta brahma upadeśaḥ yam śraddadhāneṣu śobhate

original: vayam aśraddadhānāḥ so ye yuktiṃ prārthayāmahe // YSsi_87 //
analyzed: vayam aśraddadhānāḥ saḥ u ye yuktim prārthayāmahe
prati pramātṛ viṣayam paraspara vilakṣaṇāḥ
aparokṣam prakāśante sukha duḥkha ādi vat dhiyaḥ
sambandhi vyaṅgya bhedasya saṃyoga icchā ādikasya naḥ

original: na hi bhedaḥ svato nāsti nāpratyakṣaś ca saṃataḥ // YSsi_89 //
analyzed: na hi bhedaḥ svatas na asti na apratyakṣaḥ ca
yadi sarva gatā nityā saṃvid eva abhyupeyate
tatas sarvam sadā bhāyāt
na vā kiñcid kadācana
tadānīm na hi vedyasya sannnidhi itara kāri tā
vyavasthā ghaṭate
vitteḥ vyoma vat vaibhava āśrayāt
nā api kāraṇa bhedena nityāyāḥ tad abhāvataḥ
na ca svarūpa nānātvāt
tat eka tva parigrahāt
tatas ca badhira andha ādeḥ śabda ādi grahaṇam bhavet
guru śiṣya ādi bhedaḥ ca nirnimittaḥ prasajyate

original: nanu naḥ saṃvido bhinnaṃ sarvaṃ nāma na kiñcana /
analyzed: nanu naḥ saṃvidaḥ bhinnam sarvam nāma na kiñcana

original: ataḥ sarvaṃ sadā bhāyād ityakaṇḍe 'nuyujyate // YSsi_94 //
analyzed: atas sarvam sadā bhāyāt iti akaṇḍe

original: idam ākhyāhi bho kiṃ nu nīlādir na prakāśate /
analyzed: idam ākhyāhi bho kim nu nīla ādiḥ na prakāśate

original: prakāśamāno nīlādiḥ saṃvido vā na bhidyate // YSsi_95 //
analyzed: prakāśamānaḥ nīla ādiḥ saṃvidaḥ vā na bhidyate
ādau pratīti subhagaḥ nivāhaḥ loka vedayoḥ

original: yataḥ padapadārthādi na kiñcid avabhāsate // YSsi_96 //
analyzed: yatas pada padārtha ādi na kiñcid avabhāsate
dvitīye saṃvidaḥ dvaitam vyāhanyeta samīhitam
yadi ayam vividha ākāra prapañcaḥ saṃvid ātmakaḥ

original: sāpi saṃvit tad ātmeti yato nānā prasajyate // YSsi_97 //
analyzed: sā api saṃvid tat ātmā iti yatas nānā prasajyate
na ca avidyā vilāsa tvāt bheda abheda anirūpaṇā
sā hi nyāya anala spṛṣṭā jātuṣābharaṇāyate
tathā hi yadi avidyā iyam vidyā bhāva ātmikā iṣyate

original: nirupākhyasvabhāvatvāt sā na kiñcin niyacchati // YSsi_99 //
analyzed: nirupākhya svabhāva tvāt sā na kiñcid niyacchati
artha antaram avidyā ced sādhvī bheda anirūpaṇā
artha anartha antara tva ādi na yujyate

original: vidyāto 'rthāntaraṃ cāsāv iti suvyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ // YSsi_100 //
analyzed: vidyātaḥ ṛtha antaram ca asau iti su vyāhṛtam vacaḥ
tasyāḥ te bhrānti kalpitaḥ

original: hantaivaṃ saty avidyaiva vidyā syāt paramārthataḥ // YSsi_101 //
analyzed: hanta evam sati avidyā eva vidyā syāt paramārthataḥ
kim ca śuddha a jaḍā saṃvid
avidyā iyam tu na īsṛśī

original: tat kena hetunā seyam anyaiva na nirūpyate // YSsi_102 //
analyzed: tat kena hetunā sā iyam anyā eva na nirūpyate
api ca iyam avidyā te yad abhāva ādi rūpiṇī

original: sā vidyā kiṃ nu saṃvittir vedyaṃ vā veditātha vā // YSsi_103 //
analyzed: sā vidyā kim nu saṃvittiḥ vedyam vā veditā atha vā

original: vedyatve veditṛtve ca nāsyās tābhyāṃ nivartanam /
analyzed: vedya tve veditṛ tve ca na asyāḥ tābhyām nivartanam

original: na hi jñānād ṛte 'jñānam anyatas te nivartate /
analyzed: na hi jñānāt ṛte jñānam anyatas te nivartate

original: saṃvid eveti cet tasyā nanu bhavād asambhavaḥ // YSsi_104 //
analyzed: saṃvid evā iti ced tasyāḥ nanu bhavāt asambhavaḥ
kiñca iyam tad viruddhā vā
na tasyāḥ kvāpi sambhavaḥ
yatas khilam jagat vyāptam vidyayā evā advitīyayā

original: abhāvo 'nyo viruddho vā saṃvido 'pi yad īṣyate /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ viruddhaḥ vā

original: tadānīṃ saṃvid advaita- pratijñāṃ dūratas tyaja // YSsi_106 //
analyzed: tadānīm saṃvid advaita pratijñām dūratas tyaja
kim ca asau kasya

original: jīvasya, ko jīvo yasya seti cet /
analyzed: jīvasya kaḥ jīvaḥ yasya sā iti ced

original: nanv evam asamādhānam anyonyāśrayaṇaṃ bhavet // YSsi_107 //
analyzed: nanu evam asamādhānam anyonya āśrayaṇam bhavet
na tu jīvāt avidyā syāt
na ca jīvaḥ tayā vinā

original: brahmaṇaś cen na sarvajñaṃ kathaṃ tad baṃbhramīti te(bhoḥ) /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ ced na sarvajñam katham tat baṃbhramīti tebhoḥ
avidyā kṛta deha ātma pratyaya adhīna tā na te
brahma sarvajña bhāvasya
tad svābhāvika tā śruteḥ

original: tata evāmṛṣā kasmān na svāc chabdāntarādivat // YSsi_110 //
analyzed: tatas eva amṛṣā kasmāt na svāt śabda antara ādi vat
yathā śabda antara abhyāsa sañkhyā ādyāḥ śāstra bhedakāḥ
bheda avabhāsa garbhāḥ ca yathārthāḥ
tādṛśī na kim
sarvajñe nitya mukte yadi ajñānasya sambhavaḥ

original: tejasīva tamas tasmān na nivarteta kenacit // YSsi_112 //
analyzed: tejasi iva tamaḥ tasmāt na nivarteta kenacid
sarvajña tva ādi vacana prāmāṇyam vyāvahārikam

original: niyāmakaṃ na paśyāmo nirbandhāt tāvakād ṛte // YSsi_113 //
analyzed: niyāmakam na paśyāmaḥ nirbandhāt tāvakāt ṛte
āśraya pratiyogi tve paraspara virodhinī

original: kathaṃ vaikarasaṃ brahma sad iti pratipadyate // YSsi_114 //
analyzed: katham vā ekarasam brahma sat iti pratipadyate

original: nanu sāpi tadāyattety anyonyāśrayaṇaṃ punaḥ // YSsi_115 //
analyzed: nanu sā api tad āyattā iti anyonya āśrayaṇam punar
avastu tvāt avidyāyāḥ na idam tad rūpaṇam yadi

original: vastuno dūṣaṇatvena tvayā kvedaṃ nirīkṣitam // YSsi_116 //
analyzed: vastunaḥ dūṣaṇa tvena tvayā kva idam nirīkṣitam

doṣaḥ nyonya samāśrayaḥ

original: na vastutvād avastutvād ity ato nedam uttaram // YSsi_117 //
analyzed: na vastu tvāt avastu tvāt iti atas na idam uttaram

original: kiñcāvidyā na cet ... (vastu vyavaharyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet) /

na ca asat vyoma
puṣpa ādi vyavahāra vat iṣyate

original: nāpy avastv iti co(ktau tu vastutvaṃ sidhyati dhruvam) /

niṣidhyate

original: samastena nañā vastv iti cen (matam) // YSsi_119 //

samastena nañā vastu prathamam yat niṣidhyate

original: pratiprasūtaṃ vyastena punas tad iti vastutā // YSsi_120 //
analyzed: pratiprasūtam vyastena punar tat iti vastu tā

original: ato na vastu nā(vastu na sadvacyaṃ na cāpy asat) /

bhedaḥ na kaḥ cakāsti iti vivakṣīḥ mā
sma jātucit

original: avidyā sā kim ekaiva naikā vā tad idaṃ vada /

original: tadāśrayaś ca saṃsārī tathaiko naika eva vā // YSsi_122 //

original: sā ced ekā, tatas saikā śukasya brahmavidyayā /

original: pūrvam eva nirasteti vyarthas te muktaye śramaḥ // YSsi_123 //
analyzed: pūrvam eva nirastā iti vyarthaḥ te muktaye śramaḥ

original: syān mataṃ naiva te santi vāmadevaśukādayaḥ /

yat vidyayā nirasta tvāt na adyā avidyā iti codyate
mukta amukta ādi bhedaḥ hi kalpitaḥ mad avidyayā

original: yat punar brahmavidyātas teṣāṃ muktir abhūd iti /

original: vākyaṃ tatsvāpnamuktyukti- yuktyā pratyūhyatām iti // YSsi_126 //

original: prapañcaṃ sādhayaty anyaḥ kathaṃ praty ucyate tvayā // YSsi_127 //

original: tvad avidyānimittatve yo hetus te vivakṣitaḥ /

original: sa eva hetus tasyāpi bhavet sarajñasiddhivat // YSsi_128 //

iti anyonya viruddha ukti vyāhate bhavatām mate

original: mukham astīti yat kiñcit pralapann iva lakṣyase // YSsi_129 //
analyzed: mukham asti iti yat kiñcid pralapan iva lakṣyase

original: tathaiva bhavato 'pīti vyartho mokṣāya te śramaḥ // YSsi_130 //
analyzed: tathā eva pi iti vyarthaḥ mokṣāya te śramaḥ

original: muktir bhūtocyate tadvat parastād ātmavidyayā // YSsi_131 //

original: abhāviny eva sā mithyā bhāvinīty apadiśyatām /

original: santi ca svapnadṛṣṭāni dṛṣṭāntavacanāni te // YSsi_132 //

original: nanu nedam aniṣṭaṃ me yan muktir na bhaviṣyati /

original: ātmano nityamuktatvān nityasiddhaiva sā yataḥ // YSsi_133 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ nitya mukta tvāt nitya siddhā eva sā yatas
tat idam śānti karma ādau vetāla vāhanam bhavet
yena evam sutarām vyarthaḥ brahma vidyā arjana śramaḥ
avidyā pratibaddha tvāt atha sā nitya satī api
asatī iva iti tad vyaktiḥ vidyā phalam upeyate

original: hastastham eva hemādi vismṛtaṃ mṛgyate yathā /
analyzed: hasta stham eva hema ādi vismṛtam mṛgyate yathā

original: yathā tad eva hastastham avagamyopaśāmyati // YSsi_136 //
analyzed: yathā tat eva hasta stham avagamya upaśāmyati

original: hanta keyam abhivyaktir yā vidyāphalam iṣyate /

original: svaprakāśasya cidchātor yā svarūpapade sthitā // YSsi_138 //

original: saṃvit kiṃ saiva kiṃ vāhaṃ brahmāstītīti kīdṛśī /

yadi sva rūpa saṃvid sā
nityā eva iti na

original: nanu te brahmavidyā sā saiva tasyāḥ phalaṃ katham // YSsi_140 //
analyzed: nanu te brahma vidyā sā sā eva tasyāḥ phalam katham

original: kiñ ca sā tat tvam asy ādi- vākyajanyā bhavan mate /

original: utpattimaty anityeti muktasyāpi bhayaṃ bhavet // YSsi_141 //
analyzed: utpattimatī anityā iti muktasya api bhayam bhavet
api ca vyavahāra jñāḥ sati puṣkalakāreṇa

original: kāryaṃ na jāyate yena tam āhuḥ pratibandhakam // YSsi_142 //

original: iha kiṃ tad yad utpattum upakrāntaṃ svahetutaḥ /

avidyā pratibaddha tvāt utpattim na prapadyate
na muktiḥ nitya siddha tvāt
na brahma asmi iti dhīḥ api
na hi brahma aham asmi iti saṃvid puṣkala kāraṇam

original: saṃsāriṇas tadāstīti kathaṃ sā pratibadhyate // YSsi_144 //
analyzed: saṃsāriṇaḥ tadā asti iti katham sā pratibadhyate
yatas sā kāraṇa abhāvāt idānīm nā upajāyate

original: na punaḥ pratibaddhatvād asthāne tena tadvacaḥ // YSsi_145 //
analyzed: na punar pratibaddha tvāt asthāne tena tat vacaḥ

original: kiñ caiko jīva ity etad vastusthityā na yujyate /

original: avidyātatsamāśleṣa- jīvatvādi mṛṣā hi te // YSsi_146 //
analyzed: avidyā tad samāśleṣa jīvatva ādi mṛṣā hi te

original: yato naḥ pratibhāsante saṃsarantaḥ sahasraśaḥ // YSsi_147 //
analyzed: yatas naḥ pratibhāsante saṃsarantaḥ sahasraśas
āsaṃsara samucchedam vyavahārāḥ ca tad kṛtāḥ
abādhitāḥ pratīyante svapna vṛtti vilakṣaṇāḥ
tena yauktikam eka tvam api yukti parāhatam
tad tad sva ātma vat anye śakya nihnavāḥ
yathā anumeyāt vahni ādeḥ a
numānāḥ vilakṣaṇāḥ
pratyakṣam te kṣyante

original: tathānyebhyo jīvebhyo na pṛthak katham // YSsi_150 //
analyzed: tathā anyebhyaḥ jīvebhyaḥ na pṛthak katham
na ced ceṣṭā viśeṣeṇa paraḥ boddhā anumīyate

na ca aupādhika bhedena meya mātṛ vibhāga dhīḥ
sva śarīre pi tad prāpteḥ śiraḥ pāṇi ādi bhedataḥ
yathā tatra śiraḥ pāṇi pāda ādau vedanā udaye
anusandhānam eka tve
tathā sarvatra te bhavet
prāyaṇām naraka kleśāt prasūti vyasanāt api

original: cirātivṛttāḥ prāgjanma- bhogā na smṛtigocarāḥ // YSsi_154 //
analyzed: cira ativṛttāḥ prāc janma bhogāḥ na smṛti gocarāḥ
yugapad jāyamāneṣu sukha duḥkha ādiṣu sphuṭaḥ
āśraya asaṅkaraḥ tatra katham aikārthya vibhramaḥ
na ca prātisvikā avidyā kalpita sva sva dṛśyakaiḥ

original: jīvair anekair apy eṣā lokayātropapadyate // YSsi_156 //
analyzed: jīvaiḥ anekaiḥ api eṣā lokayātrā upapadyate
para varta anabhijñāḥ te sva sva svapna eka darśinaḥ

ca svayaṃprakāśa tva vibhu tva eka tva nitya tāḥ
tvad abhyupetāḥ bādheran saṃvidaḥ te dvitīya tām
saṃvid eva na te dharmāḥ
siddhāyām api saṃvidi
vivāda darśanāt teṣu
tardrūpāṇām ca bhedataḥ

original: na ca te bhrāntisiddhās te yenādvaitāvirodhinaḥ /
analyzed: na ca te bhrānti siddhāḥ te yena advaita avirodhinaḥ

original: tattvāvedakavedānta- vākyasiddhā hi te guṇāḥ // YSsi_160 //
analyzed: tattva āvedaka vedānta vākya siddhāḥ hi te guṇāḥ
brahma svarūpam eva iṣṭam
tatra api idam vivicyatām

original: brahmeti yāvan nirdiṣṭaṃ tanmātraṃ kiṃ sukhādayaḥ /
analyzed: brahma iti yāvat nirdiṣṭam tanmātram kim sukha ādayaḥ
atha vā tasya te

original: yad vā ta eva brahmasaṃjñinaḥ // YSsi_162 //
analyzed: yat vā te eva brahma saṃjñinaḥ
ādye tad tad pada āmnāna vaiyarthyam veda lokayoḥ
pūrva ukta nītyā bhedaḥ ca
jagat janma ādi kāraṇam

original: abhyupetyaiva hi brahma vivādās teṣu vadinām /
analyzed: abhyupetya eva hi brahma vivādāḥ teṣu vadinām

original: dvitīye saiva tair eva brahmaṇaḥ sadvitīyatā // YSsi_164 //
analyzed: dvitīye sā eva taiḥ eva brahmaṇaḥ sa dvitīya tā

original: tṛtīye brahma bhidyeta tanmātratvāt pade pade /
analyzed: tṛtīye brahma bhidyeta tanmātra tvāt pade pade
tad samūhaḥ vā brahma taru vṛnda vana ādi vat

original: prakarṣaś ca prakāśaś ca bhinnāv evārkavartinau /
analyzed: prakarṣaḥ ca prakāśaḥ ca bhinnau eva arka vartinau

original: tena na kvāpi vākyārtho vibhāgo 'sti nidarśanam // YSsi_166 //
analyzed: tena na kvāpi vākya arthaḥ vibhāgaḥ sti nidarśanam
jāḍya duḥkha ādi apohena yadi ekatra eva vartitā
jñana ānanda ādi śabdānām na sataḥ sa dvitīya tā
apohāḥ kim na santi eva
santaḥ vā
na ubhaye pi vā

original: sattve sat sadvitīyaṃ syāj jaḍādyātmakatetare (tā pare) // YSsi_168 //
analyzed: sattve sat sa dvitīyam syāt jaḍa ādi ātmaka tā itare pare

original: tathātve ca ghaṭādibhyo brahmāpi na viśiṣyate // YSsi_169 //
analyzed: tathātve ca ghaṭa ādibhyaḥ brahmā api na viśiṣyate
kim ca apohya jaḍa tva ādi viruddha artha asām arpaṇe

original: naiva tattadapohyate tadekārthaiḥ padair iva // YSsi_170 //
analyzed: na eva tat tat apohyate tad eka arthaiḥ padaiḥ iva

original: saivābhāva itīhāpi sadbhis te sadvitīyatā // YSsi_171 //

original: kuto 'vasīyate kiṃ nu pratyakṣāder utāgamāt // YSsi_172 //
analyzed: kutas vasīyate kim nu pratyakṣa ādeḥ uta āgamāt

original: pratyakṣādīni mānāni svaṃ svam arthaṃ yathāyatham /
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādīni mānāni svam svam artham yathāyatham

original: vyavacchindanti jāyanta iti yāvat svasākṣikam // YSsi_173 //
analyzed: vyavacchindanti jāyante iti yāvat sva sākṣikam

original: yathāgrataḥ sthite nīle nīlimānyakathā na, dhīḥ /

original: ekākārā, na hi tayā sphaṭike dhavale matiḥ // YSsi_174 //
analyzed: eka ākārā na hi tayā sphaṭike dhavale matiḥ
kṣīre madhura dhīḥ yadṛc
nā eva nimba kaṣāya dhīḥ

original: vyavahārāś ca niyataḥ sarve laukikavaidikāḥ // YSsi_175 //
analyzed: vyavahārāḥ ca niyataḥ sarve laukika vaidikāḥ

original: satyaṃ pratītir asaty asyā mūlaṃ nāstīti cen na tat /
analyzed: satyam pratītiḥ asatī asyāḥ mūlam na asti iti ced na tat

original: sā ced asti tasyā mūlaṃ kalpyatāṃ kāryabhūtayā // YSsi_176 //
analyzed: sā ced asti tasyāḥ mūlam kalpyatām kārya bhūtayā
kḷpam ca indriya liṅga ādi tad bhāva anuvidhānataḥ
yaugapadya krama ayoga ādi avaccheda vidhānayoḥ

original: aikyāyogāc ca bhedo na pratyakṣa iti yo bhramaḥ /
analyzed: aikya ayogāt ca bhedaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ iti yaḥ bhramaḥ
bheda itaretara abhāva viveka agrahaṇena saḥ
sva rūpam eva bhāvābām pratyakṣeṇa pariśurat
bheda vyāhāra hetuḥ syāt pratiyogi vyapekṣayā
yathā tanmātra dhīḥ nānā nāstivyāhāra sādhanī
hlasva dīrgha tva bhedāḥ vā yathā ekatra ṣaṣ aṅgule
evam vyavasthita aneka prakāra ākāravat tayā
pratyakṣasya prapañcasya śakya nihnavaḥ

original: āgamaḥ kāryaniṣṭhatvād īdṛśe 'rthe na tu pramā /
analyzed: āgamaḥ kārya niṣṭha tvāt īdṛśe rthe na tu pramā

original: prāmāṇye 'py anvayāyogya- padārthatvān na bodhakaḥ // YSsi_182 //
analyzed: prāmāṇye pi anvaya ayogya padārtha tvāt na bodhakaḥ
na asat pratīteḥ

original: bādhāc ca na sad ity api yan na tat /
analyzed: bādhāt ca na sat iti api yat na tat

original: pratīter eva sat kiṃ na bādhān nāsat kuto jagat ? /
analyzed: pratīteḥ eva sat kim na bādhāt na asat kutas jagat
tasmāt avidyayā eva iyam avidyā bhavatā āśritā
kim ca bheda prapañcasya dharmaḥ mithyātva lakṣaṇaḥ

original: mithyā vā paramārtho vā nādyaḥ kalpo 'yam añjasā // YSsi_184 //
analyzed: mithyā vā parama arthaḥ vā na ādyaḥ kalpaḥ yam añjasā
tad mithyātve prapañcasya satya tvam durapahnavam
pāramārthye tena eva tava advaitam vihanyate

original: sarvāṇy eva pramāṇāni svaṃ svam arthaṃ yathoditam /
analyzed: sarvāṇi eva pramāṇāni svam svam artham yathā uditam

original: asato 'rthāntarebhyaś ca vyavacchindanti bhānti naḥ // YSsi_183 //
analyzed: asataḥ ṛtha antarebhyaḥ ca vyavacchindanti bhānti naḥ

original: tathā hīha ghaṭo 'stīti yeyaṃ dhīr upajāyate /
analyzed: tathā hi iha ghaṭaḥ sti iti yā iyam dhīḥ upajāyate

original: sā tadā tasya nābhāvaṃ paṭatvaṃ vānumanyate // YSsi_187 //
analyzed: sā tadā tasya na abhāvam paṭa tvam vā anumanyate

original: nanv astīti yad uktaṃ kiṃ tanmātraṃ ghaṭa ity api /
analyzed: nanu asti iti yat uktam kim tanmātram ghaṭaḥ iti api
artha antaram vā
tanmātre sat advaitam prasajyate

original: arthāntaratve siddhaṃ tat sadasadbhyāṃ vilakṣaṇam // YSsi_188 //
analyzed: artha antara tve siddham tat sat asadbhyām vilakṣaṇam

original: yady evam asti brahmeti brahmaupaniṣadaṃ matam /
analyzed: yadi evam asti brahma iti brahmaupaniṣadam matam
ghaṭa vat sat asat tvābhyām anirvācyam tava āpatet
ānanda satya jñāna ādi nirdeśaiḥ eva vaidikaiḥ
brahmaṇaḥ pi atathābhāvaḥ tvayā eva evam samarthitaḥ
sat asat vyatireka uktiḥ prapañcasya ca hīyate

original: yad yathā kiñcid ucyeta tatsarvasya tathā bhavet // YSsi_191 //
analyzed: yat yathā kiñcid ucyeta tat sarvasya tathā bhavet
tasmāt asti iti saṃvittiḥ jāyamānā ghaṭa ādiṣu
sajātīya vijātīya vyavaccheda nibandhanaiḥ

original: svaiḥ svair vyavasthitai rūpaiḥ padārthānāṃ tu yā sthitiḥ /
analyzed: svaiḥ svaiḥ vyavasthitaiḥ rūpaiḥ padārthānām tu yā sthitiḥ

original: sā sattā na svatantrānyā tatrādvaitakathā katham // YSsi_193 //
analyzed: sā sattā na svatantrā anyā tatra advaita kathā katham
na ca nānāvidha ākāra pratītiḥ śakya nihnavā

original: na vedyaṃ vittidharmaḥ syād iti yatprāgudīritam // YSsi_194 //
analyzed: na vedyam vitti dharmaḥ syāt iti yat prāk udīritam

original: tenāpi sādhitaṃ kiñcit saṃvido 'sti na vā tvayā /
analyzed: tena api sādhitam kiñcid saṃvidaḥ sti na vā tvayā

original: asti cet pakṣapātaḥ syān na cet te viphalaḥ śramaḥ // YSsi_195 //
analyzed: asti ced pakṣapātaḥ syāt na ced te viphalaḥ śramaḥ
atas dṛṣṭa bhedāḥ tu saṃvidaḥ
yathā avasthāyibhiḥ
R na aikyam yānti ghaṭa ādibhiḥ
saha upalambha niyamaḥ na khalu ekaika saṃvidā

original: na ced asti sasāmānyaṃ sarvaṃ saṃvedanāspadam // YSsi_197 //
analyzed: na ced asti sa sāmānyam sarvam saṃvedana āspadam
saha upalambha niyamāt na anyaḥ rthaḥ saṃvidaḥ bhavet

original: yad etad aparādhīna- svaprakāśaṃ tad eva hi /
analyzed: yat etat sva prakāśam tat eva hi
iti bṛddhāḥ pracakṣate

original: yasminn abhāsamāne 'pi yo nāmārtho na bhāsate /
analyzed: yasmin a bhāsamāne pi yaḥ nāma arthaḥ na bhāsate

original: nāsāv arthāntaras tasmān mithyendur iva candrataḥ // YSsi_199 //
analyzed: na asau artha antaraḥ tasmāt mithyā induḥ iva candrataḥ
a bhāsamāne vijñāne na ca ātma artha avabhāsanam

original: iti saṃvidvivartatvaṃ prapañcaḥ sphuṭam añcati // YSsi_200 // *****
analyzed: iti saṃvid vivarta tvam prapañcaḥ sphuṭam añcati
mā evam sma arthān paribhavaḥ
pratyakṣeṇa balīyasā
saṃrakṣyamāṇa bhedāḥ te na anumāna anuvartinaḥ

original: tathā hīdam ahaṃ vedmīty anyonyānātmanā sphuṭam /
analyzed: tathā hi idam aham vedmi iti anyonya anātmanā sphuṭam

original: trayaṃ sākṣāc cakāstīti sarveṣām atmasākṣikam // YSsi_202 //
analyzed: trayam sākṣāt cakāsti iti sarveṣām atma sākṣikam
pratyakṣa pratipakṣam ca na anumānam pravartate

original: na hi vahner anuṣṇatvaṃ dravyatvād anumīyate // YSsi_203 //
analyzed: na hi vahneḥ an uṣṇa tvam dravya tvāt anumīyate

original: kiñ ca hetur viruddho 'yaṃ sahabhāvo dvayor yataḥ /
analyzed: kim ca hetuḥ viruddhaḥ yam sahabhāvaḥ dvayoḥ yatas

original: tavāpi na hi saṃvitiḥ svātmanā saha bhāsate // YSsi_204 //
analyzed: tava api na hi saṃvitiḥ sva ātmanā saha bhāsate
svāpa ādau bhāsate
na evam arthaḥ saṃvedanāt pṛthak

original: tena saṃvedanaṃ satyaṃ aṃvedyo 'rthas tv asann iti // YSsi_205 //
analyzed: tena saṃvedanam satyam rthaḥ tu asān iti
tat etat aparāmṛṣṭa sva vāc bādhasya jalpitam
ahopalambha niyamaḥ yena evam sati hīyate
yasmāt ṛte yat ābhāti bhāti te
smāt ṛte pi tat

original: ghaṭād ṛte 'pi nirbhātaḥ paṭād iva ghaṭaḥ svayam // YSsi_207 //
analyzed: ghaṭāt ṛte nirbhātaḥ paṭāt iva ghaṭaḥ svayam
